description:
Stay in the middle of all the action in a luxury Murray Hill. This chic and modern apartment comfortably sleeps 2 and is located on the 8th floor. Visitors will feel right at home with features like wireless internet, flat screen TVs, kitchen appliances, and a dining area.
The spacious, sun-lit apartment and oversized windows showcase exciting views.

** Kitchen equipped with standard appliances.
** Washer/Dryer in the unit
** Wireless internet available
** Flat screen TV with basic channels in the bedroom and in living room
** Towels and Linens provided free of charge
name: Chic and modern apartment
review: Bole was very responsive. She was easily reachable and helpful. The apartment is spacious and comfortable. Thank you for this pleasant stay.
